var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
gr.addEncodedQuery("sys_idIN02d3ff59db223c50b715aa1d139619e0,8b14b35ddb223c50b715aa1d139619be,275377d1db223c50b715aa1d13961969,f0c3b359db223c50b715aa1d1396197b,acc37359db223c50b715aa1d139619ea,98c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e4,a0c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e7,81c3f359db223c50b715aa1d13961989,f8c3b359db223c50b715aa1d1396197d,a4c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619ed,f4c3b359db223c50b715aa1d1396197c,8dc3f359db223c50b715aa1d13961991,81c3f359db223c50b715aa1d1396198e,89c3f359db223c50b715aa1d13961990,acc37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e5,94c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e3,f0c3b359db223c50b715aa1d13961980,a0c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619ec,f8c3b359db223c50b715aa1d13961982,a4c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e8,a8c37359db223c50b715aa1d139619e9,e8c3b359db223c50b715aa1d13961978,f4c3b359db223c50b715aa1d13961981,89c3f359db223c50b715aa1d1396198b,85c3f359db223c50b715aa1d1396198f,fcc3b359db223c50b715aa1d1396197e,8dc3f359db223c50b715aa1d1396198c,85c3f359db223c50b715aa1d1396198a,81c3f359db223c50b715aa1d13961993^ORDERBYname");

while (gr.next()) {
    gr.sys_class_name = 'u_cmdb_ci_customer_vm_instance';
    gr.update();
}
